title: Jelly (SLASH'EM)
data:
[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") adds a number of new [jelly](/wiki/Jelly "Jelly") monsters. With the exception of the clear jelly, all possess an acidic engulfing attack, a passive attack, and cause acid damage when eaten.

Keep in mind that the engulfing attack of SLASH'EM can corrode objects in open inventory (including your [alignment key](/wiki/Alignment_key "Alignment key")). In Vanila, only worn armor can be damaged this way.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Clear jelly](#Clear_jelly)
- [2 Yellow jelly](#Yellow_jelly)
- [3 Orange jelly](#Orange_jelly)
- [4 Rancid jelly](#Rancid_jelly)

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                |
| A clear jelly:* can flow under doors.
* can cling to the ceiling.
* can [blend in with its surroundings](/wiki/Hide "Hide").
* [does not breathe](/wiki/Breathless "Breathless").
* has [no eyes](/wiki/Eyeless "Eyeless").
* has no limbs.
* has no head.
* is [mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is neither male nor female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* does not appear in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom"). |                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line939](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line939 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

The **clear jelly** has the ability to conceal itself, so adventurers may not see it until they stumble into it.

Although it has an [acid](/wiki/Acid "Acid") attack, eating it will not damage you. In fact, it can actually give you [cold resistance](/wiki/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance").

The **yellow jelly** possesses a passive stun attack in addition to the acidic engulfing. Eating the corpse of a yellow jelly will cause hallucination in addition to acid damage. It is much like the Yellow Mold that is seen in vanilla NetHack as well as SLASH'EM.

html:
Jelly (SLASH'EM)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

SLASH'EM adds a number of new jelly monsters. With the exception of the clear jelly, all possess an acidic engulfing attack, a passive attack, and cause acid damage when eaten.

Keep in mind that the engulfing attack of SLASH'EM can corrode objects in open inventory (including your alignment key). In Vanila, only worn armor can be damaged this way.

Contents

  • 1 Clear jelly
  • 2 Yellow jelly
  • 3 Orange jelly
  • 4 Rancid jelly

Clear jelly

j clear jelly
Difficulty 7
Attacks Touch 3d6 acid
j clear jelly
Difficulty 7
Attacks

Touch 3d6 acid

Base level 6
Base experience 82
Speed 3
Base AC 8
Base MR 10
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 50
Nutritional value 20
Size Medium
Resistances cold, poison
Resistances conveyed poison (20%), cold (20%)

A clear jelly:

  • can flow under doors.
  • can cling to the ceiling.
  • can blend in with its surroundings.
  • does not breathe.
  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • does not appear in Gehennom.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line939

The clear jelly has the ability to conceal itself, so adventurers may not see it until they stumble into it.

Although it has an acid attack, eating it will not damage you. In fact, it can actually give you cold resistance.

Yellow jelly

j yellow jelly
Difficulty 10
Attacks Engulfing 3d6 acid, Passive 2d6 stun
j yellow jelly
Difficulty 10
Attacks

Engulfing 3d6 acid, Passive 2d6 stun

Base level 8
Base experience 124
Speed 5
Base AC 8
Base MR 20
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 250
Nutritional value 220
Size Medium
Resistances acid, petrification
Resistances conveyed Cures stoning

A yellow jelly:

  • can flow under doors.
  • does not breathe.
  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • is acidic to eat.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • does not appear in Gehennom.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line956

The yellow jelly possesses a passive stun attack in addition to the acidic engulfing. Eating the corpse of a yellow jelly will cause hallucination in addition to acid damage. It is much like the Yellow Mold that is seen in vanilla NetHack as well as SLASH'EM.

Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line964

The orange jelly possesses a passive sleep attack in addition to the acidic engulfing. Avoid attacking them in melee if you do not possess sleep resistance.

  • is mindless.
  • is acidic to eat.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • does not appear in Gehennom.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line972

Rancid Jellies possess the same basic acidic passive and engulf attack as their weaker brethren, with no other distinct ability. They are, however, the most powerful of all the jellies.

rawPage:
[[SLASH'EM]] adds a number of new [[jelly]] monsters. With the exception of the clear jelly, all possess an acidic engulfing attack, a passive attack, and cause acid damage when eaten.

Keep in mind that the engulfing attack of SLASH'EM can corrode objects in open inventory (including your [[alignment key]]). In Vanila, only worn armor can be damaged this way.

== Clear jelly ==
{{ monster
 |name=clear jelly
 |difficulty=7
 |level=6
 |experience=82
 |speed=3
 |AC=8
 |MR=10
 |align=0
 |frequency=1
 |genocidable=Yes
 |attacks=Touch 3d6 [[acid]]
 |resistances conveyed=poison (20%), cold (20%)
 |resistances=cold, poison
 |attributes={{attributes|A clear jelly|nohell=1|breathless=1|cling=1|hide=1|amorphous=1|noeyes=1|nolimbs=1|nohead=1|mindless=1|omnivore=1|hostile=1|neuter=1}}
 |size=Medium
 |nutr=20
 |weight=50
 |reference=[[SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line939]]
}}

The '''clear jelly''' has the ability to conceal itself, so adventurers may not see it until they stumble into it.

Although it has an [[acid]] attack, eating it will not damage you. In fact, it can actually give you [[cold resistance]].
{{clear}}
== Yellow jelly ==
{{ monster
 |name=yellow jelly
 |difficulty=10
 |level=8
 |experience=124
 |speed=5
 |AC=8
 |MR=20
 |align=0
 |frequency=1
 |genocidable=Yes
 |attacks=[[Engulfing]] 3d6 [[acid]], [[Passive]] 2d6 [[stun]]
 |resistances conveyed=Cures [[stoning]]
 |resistances=acid, petrification
 |attributes={{attributes|A yellow jelly|nohell=1|breathless=1|amorphous=1|noeyes=1|nolimbs=1|nohead=1|mindless=1|acid=1|omnivore=1|hostile=1|neuter=1}}
 |size=Medium
 |nutr=220
 |weight=250
 |reference=[[SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line956]]
}}
The '''yellow jelly''' possesses a passive stun attack in addition to the acidic engulfing. Eating the corpse of a yellow jelly will cause hallucination in addition to acid damage. It is much like the Yellow Mold that is seen in vanilla NetHack as well as SLASH'EM.
{{clear}}

== Orange jelly ==
{{ monster
 |name=orange jelly
 |difficulty=10
 |level=8
 |experience=132
 |speed=5
 |AC=8
 |MR=20
 |align=0
 |frequency=1
 |genocidable=Yes
 |attacks=[[Engulfing]] 2d8 [[acid]], [[Passive]] 2d6 [[sleep]]
 |resistances conveyed=Cures [[stoning]]
 |resistances=acid, petrification
 |attributes={{attributes|A orange jelly|nohell=1|breathless=1|amorphous=1|noeyes=1|nolimbs=1|nohead=1|mindless=1|acid=1|omnivore=1|hostile=1|neuter=1}}
 |size=Medium
 |nutr=220
 |weight=250
 |reference=[[SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line964]]
}}
The '''orange jelly''' possesses a passive sleep attack in addition to the acidic engulfing. Avoid attacking them in melee if you do not possess sleep resistance.
{{clear}}

== Rancid jelly ==
{{ monster
 |name=rancid jelly
 |difficulty=14
 |level=12
 |experience=306
 |speed=5
 |AC=8
 |MR=20
 |align=0
 |frequency=1
 |genocidable=Yes
 |attacks=[[Engulfing]] 4d6 [[acid]], [[Passive]] 3d6 [[acid]]
 |resistances conveyed=Cures [[stoning]]
 |resistances=acid, petrification
 |attributes={{attributes|A rancid jelly|nohell=1|breathless=1|amorphous=1|noeyes=1|nolimbs=1|nohead=1|mindless=1|acid=1|omnivore=1|hostile=1|neuter=1}}
 |size=Medium
 |nutr=220
 |weight=250
 |reference=[[SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line972]]
}}

Rancid Jellies possess the same basic acidic passive and engulf attack as their weaker brethren, with no other distinct ability. They are, however, the most powerful of all the jellies.
{{stub}}
